name: unexpected-image
description: Image metadata plugin for the Unexpected assertion library

scripts.test: mocha test/**/*.js documentation/**/*.md && npm run lint
scripts.ci: npm test && npm run coverage && npm run generate-site
scripts.coverage: NODE_ENV=development nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text --all -- npm test && echo google-chrome coverage/lcov-report/index.html
scripts.generate-site: generate-site --require ./bootstrap-unexpected-markdown.js && cp magic-pen-6-colours.jpg site-build && cp magic-pen-6-colours.jpg site-build/assertions/string/to-have-metadata-satisfying/

author: Andreas Lind <andreaslindpetersen@gmail.com>
